title: Sual thimah hian kan vakvai rei tawh lo vang
lyrics:
Sual thimah hian kan vakvai rei tawh lo vang,
Ni tin kan chatuan hmun kan hnaih;
Pathian en vel khawpuiah khian kan kal ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah.

Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah (2)
Kan Lalpa kan hmu ang a, kan lawm tawh ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah.

Lawng chawlh hmunah hmangaihten min lo hmuak ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah;
Khawvel sual leh buaina a ta kan chhuak ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah.

Dam loh, lungngaih buaina a awm tawh lo vang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah;
Thih vanga thian inthen kan intawk leh ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah.

Chatuanin ropuinain min en vel ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah;
Lui ral hla takah khian hlimin kan zai ang,
Kawngkhar mawi khi an hawn hunah.
